Class Quiz

  • java.lang.Object
    • Quiz

  • public class Quiz
extends java.lang.Object
    Quiz Class is a class that holds questions and assesses students.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Quiz()
      Constructor for objects of class Quiz
      Quiz(java.lang.String f, java.lang.String l, QuestionBank b, int n)
      Constructor for objects of class Quiz.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean add(Question q)
      Add a new question to the quiz after checking that it isn't a duplicate - returns true if added
      int check(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> a)
      Takes in the set of answers, checks them, stores those results (right = 1, wrong = 0), and returns the number of correct answers
      boolean contains(Question q)
      Check to see if Question q is in the quiz
      Question get(int n)
      Returns a question
      java.lang.String getName()
      Return the student full name
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getResults()
      Returns the right/wrong results as 1/0
      int getScore()
      Returns the number of correct responses
      void randomize()
      Rearrange the order of the answers in each question
      int size()
      Returns the number of questions in the quiz
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns in a quiz format, with name, question, and all answers for each - used for testing, but could use in a print quiz option

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Quiz

        public Quiz()
        Constructor for objects of class Quiz

      • Quiz

        public Quiz(java.lang.String f,
            java.lang.String l,
            QuestionBank b,
            int n)
        Constructor for objects of class Quiz. Build a random n-question quiz using a provided question bank.
        Parameters:
        f - the first name of the student
        l - the last name of the student
        b - the question bank to pull questions from
        n - the number of questions needed

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public boolean add(Question q)
        Add a new question to the quiz after checking that it isn't a duplicate - returns true if added
        Parameters:
        q - the question object to be added

      • check

        public int check(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> a)
        Takes in the set of answers, checks them, stores those results (right = 1, wrong = 0), and returns the number of correct answers
        Parameters:
        a - the student answers to the questions

      • contains

        Check to see if Question q is in the quiz
        Parameters:
